author: eptwts
text:
the first step to growing a personal brand is to realize nobody gives a f*ck about you...

your ego won't like this, but chances are that you're not interesting whatsoever

this isn't an issue, neither am i but i still managed to grow this account to 60k followers in a little over a year

here's how you can do it too...

instead of making your audience care about you or your story, make them care for what you can do for them

in the early stages your content has two purposes:
- to let them know why they should listen to you
- to be valuable to them

people will begin to care about your brand & story through exposure with your "value" content if you include hints of your personality in it
